Articles.Content: It's the end of the world. Yesterday was not devnotes tuesday! I wonder what happened. Maybe Squad is hard at work on .24 and forgot all about the outside world. Atleast thats what i hope happened, and nothing more sinister is involved

I noticed the same(I have been refreshing the page periodically all night), though I wouldn't jump to conclusions just right away(I like facts to play with).

.24 will come when it comes(duh), in the meantime I'm enjoying .23.5

-

Kolbjorn

I noticed the same(I have been refreshing the page periodically all night), though I wouldn't jump to conclusions just right away(I like facts to play with).

.24 will come when it comes(duh), in the meantime I'm enjoying .23.5

-

Kolbjorn

Im sure they have a good reason for the lack of devnotes.
last time this happened a mod came in with a link to the tumbler or something, it was up, it just wasnt on the forums yet. any mod assistance?

last time this happened a mod came in with a link to the tumbler or something, it was up, it just wasnt on the forums yet. any mod assistance?

I don't see anything on tumblr really. No tweets either, I think something must have come up
Sometimes they forget (or are unable) to put up the Devnotes on Tuesday. Perhaps they'll come Wednesday?

One of the staff members responsible for publishing The Daily Kerbal has been gone on vacation, and the others are very busy this week handling the release of ARM and working on 0.24.

Be patient and keep an eye out on media outlets, the devnotes will be available within the next couple days, at the most.

The Kerbal Space Program Tumblr and Facebook pages can be found here, and here, respectively.
